name: Not Rude Bear
description:
WARNING: This is not a Rude Bear game. This is a RAD BOAR GAME.

Rude Bear is busy releasing Super Rude Bear Resurrection. So join Rad Boar on his adventure!

Go forth and defeat Count Brapula, the Vampire King. By fetch questing!

Press buttons! use items! Prove that even Rad Boar can be cool!

Info:

I didn’t have time to implement SFX or VFX this time because I’m launching a game in a week and I had to do press releases, PlayStation metadata etc. etc, so I lost maybe like 6 hours to nonsense. I was only expecting to do 1 day so I also started very half arsed, but I ended up falling in love with my game so I finished it over 3.

((For those of you who don’t know, I make a Rude Bear game every Ludum Dare, there are currently 15 if you count this and Rudum Bare)).

Team:

Alex Rose - Code, Design, Characters, animation, all of the flat art etc.

Simon Wong - All art assets (characters, sheds, items etc.)

Atmospherium - Music

Controls (YOU SHOULD REALLY READ THIS):

PS4:

X: JUMP

Square: INTERACT (or use item with other item)

Circle: PICK UP/DROP

XBOX:

A: JUMP

X: INTERACT (or use item with other item)

B: PICK UP/DROP

WASD:

Space: JUMP

X: INTERACT (or use item with other item)

C: PICK UP/DROP

AZERTY:

Space: JUMP

X: INTERACT (or use item with other item)

C: PICK UP/DROP

DVORAK:

Space: JUMP

Q: INTERACT (or use item with other item)

J: PICK UP/DROP
